subject: Re: [junit] automation tool for GUI testing ...
msgSnippet: What do you mean JUnit doesn t support eclipse (assuming you are talking about the open source IDE project)? And I believe eclipse support JUnit. ... --
messageBody:
What do you mean JUnit doesn't support eclipse (assuming you are talking
about the open source IDE project)?

And I believe eclipse support JUnit.

Pradeep Bojan wrote:

>Is there any tool for automating GUI, designed by eclipse. I basically need
>it for doing regression testing. Junit doesn't support eclipse. Please
>let me know.
>
>Regards,
>
>Pradeep.
>
>


--
